The Hypermodern Python Project¶

The example project for the Hypermodern Python article series. The command-line interface runs General Hough Transform on any .png images.

Installation¶

To install the Hypermodern Python project, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install semester6

Usage¶

Hypermodern Python’s usage looks like:

$ poetry run semester6 [OPTIONS]
--reference_path¶

Path to the image that contains shape which is to be found on images.

--query_path¶

Path to the image that contains reference shape.

--threshold¶

Controls how many points will be counted as centers. Lower value means more points. For line detection, consider 0.05 - 0.15. For other shapes, 0.85 - 0.95.

--version¶

Display the version and exit.

--help¶

Display a short usage message and exit.

semester6
